alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:46AM PST until January 28 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM PST THIS EVENING ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From noon today to 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will increase this evening, resulting in wind chills decreasing into the teens or single digits overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Wet roads may freeze quickly this afternoon and evening. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley
